thread.title: Johnny Yunes
thread.title_full: PGS Gold & Coin reviewed by Johnny Yunes

author: Johnny Yunes
title: Johnny Yunes
text: Susan Darby, was super great to me. Wallet was stolen and needed money for a flight to get home back to my duty stationed. Susan worked with and was able to get me home with some items I had. Great interpersonal skills, smile, and customer service. Thank you Susan.
